text: The Malavettuvan is one of the tribal communities in the Kasaragod district of Kerala state, India.They are called vettuvans, because they were experts in hunting.Material culture of the Malavettuvans in Kasaragod district, Salu.P, Department of Anthropology, Kannur university,2009 ==References== Category:People from Kasaragod district
title: Malavettuvan
